queryMap.query: SELECT '0' AS CHK ,RACER_PERIO_NO ,ITEM ,ASSGN_SCR_RATE ,RMK FROM TBDN_SELT_BAS_ITEM WHERE RACER_PERIO_NO = NVL(?, RACER_PERIO_NO)
SELECT CD RACER_PERIO_NO FROM TBDM_SPEC_CD WHERE GRP_CD = 'D10000' ORDER BY CD DESC

SELECT B.RACER_PERIO_NO ,B.REPT_NO ,B.NM_KOR ,A.DT ,A.HGHT ,A.WGHT ,A.SIGHT_LEFT ,A.SIGHT_RIGHT ,A.BLOD_PRES ,A.HEAR_LEFT ,A.HEAR_RIGHT ,A.COLOR_WEAK ,A.ECG ,A.CARDIAC_TEST ,A.RSLT ,A.IRREG_RSN ,TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY') - SUBSTR(BIRTH, 1, 4) + 1 AS AGE ,DECODE(SEX, 'M', '남', 'F', '여') AS SEX -- CASE WHEN SUBSTR(FC_DEC(B.RES_NO),7,1) = 1 THEN '남' ELSE '여' END AS SEX FROM TBDN_SELT_BODY_INSP A, TBDN_SELT_REPT B WHERE B.RACER_PERIO_NO = A.RACER_PERIO_NO(+) AND B.REPT_NO = A.REPT_NO(+) AND NVL(B.DEL_YN,'N') = 'N' AND B.RACER_PERIO_NO = NVL(?, B.RACER_PERIO_NO) AND B.REPT_NO = NVL(?, B.REPT_NO) ORDER BY B.REPT_NO

SELECT A1.RACER_PERIO_NO RACER_PERIO_NO ,A1.REPT_NO REPT_NO ,A1.NM_KOR NM_KOR ,A1.SEX_GBN SEX_GBN ,A1.DT DT ,A1.REC_01 REC_01 ,A1.SCR_01 SCR_01 ,A1.REC_02 REC_02 ,A1.SCR_02 SCR_02 ,A1.REC_03 REC_03 ,A1.SCR_03 SCR_03 ,A1.REC_04 REC_04 ,A1.SCR_04 SCR_04 ,A1.REC_05 REC_05 ,A1.SCR_05 SCR_05 ,A1.REC_06 REC_06 ,A1.SCR_06 SCR_06 ,A1.REC_07 REC_07 ,A1.SCR_07 SCR_07 ,A1.REC_08 REC_08 ,A1.SCR_08 SCR_08 --,A1.REC_09 REC_09 --,A1.SCR_09 SCR_09 --,A1.REC_10 REC_10 --,A1.SCR_10 SCR_10 --,A1.REC_11 REC_11 --,A1.SCR_11 SCR_11 ,A1.TOT_SCR TOT_SCR ,A1.AVG_SCR AVG_SCR ,DECODE(NVL(A1.TOT_SCR,0),0,999, RANK() OVER (ORDER BY NVL(A1.TOT_SCR,0) DESC)) RANK FROM ( SELECT B.RACER_PERIO_NO RACER_PERIO_NO ,B.REPT_NO REPT_NO ,B.NM_KOR NM_KOR ,A.DT DT -- ,DECODE(SUBSTR(FC_DEC(B.RES_NO),7,1),'1','001','002') SEX_GBN ,DECODE(MIN(SEX), 'M', '001', 'F', '002') AS SEX_GBN ,NVL(MAX(A.REC_01), 0) REC_01 ,NVL(MAX(A.SCR_01), 0) SCR_01 ,NVL(MAX(A.REC_02), 0) REC_02 ,NVL(MAX(A.SCR_02), 0) SCR_02 ,NVL(MAX(A.REC_03), 0) REC_03 ,NVL(MAX(A.SCR_03), 0) SCR_03 ,NVL(MAX(A.REC_04), 0) REC_04 ,NVL(MAX(A.SCR_04), 0) SCR_04 ,NVL(MAX(A.REC_05), 0) REC_05 ,NVL(MAX(A.SCR_05), 0) SCR_05 ,NVL(MAX(A.REC_06), 0) REC_06 ,NVL(MAX(A.SCR_06), 0) SCR_06 ,NVL(MAX(A.REC_07), 0) REC_07 ,NVL(MAX(A.SCR_07), 0) SCR_07 ,NVL(MAX(A.REC_08), 0) REC_08 ,NVL(MAX(A.SCR_08), 0) SCR_08 --,A.REC_09 REC_09 --,NVL(MAX(A.SCR_09), 0) SCR_09 --,A.REC_10 REC_10 --,NVL(MAX(A.SCR_10), 0) SCR_10 --,A.REC_11 REC_11 --,NVL(MAX(A.SCR_11), 0) SCR_11 ,NVL(ROUND(SUM( A.SCR_01+A.SCR_02+A.SCR_03+A.SCR_04+A.SCR_05+A.SCR_06+A.SCR_07+A.SCR_08) ,1),0) TOT_SCR ,NVL(ROUND(AVG((A.SCR_01+A.SCR_02+A.SCR_03+A.SCR_04+A.SCR_05+A.SCR_06+A.SCR_07+A.SCR_08)/8),1),0) AVG_SCR FROM TBDN_SELT_STRT_MESUR A, TBDN_SELT_REPT B WHERE B.RACER_PERIO_NO = A.RACER_PERIO_NO(+) AND NVL(B.DEL_YN,'N') = 'N' AND B.REPT_NO = A.REPT_NO(+) AND B.RACER_PERIO_NO = ? AND B.REPT_NO = NVL(?, B.REPT_NO) GROUP BY B.RACER_PERIO_NO,B.REPT_NO,B.NM_KOR,A.DT, A.REC_01,A.REC_02,A.REC_03,A.REC_04,A.REC_05,A.REC_06,A.REC_07,A.REC_08 )A1 ORDER BY A1.REPT_NO

SELECT B.RACER_PERIO_NO ,B.REPT_NO ,DECODE(SUBSTR(FC_DEC(B.RES_NO),7,1),'1','001','002') SEX_GBN ,B.NM_KOR ,A.DT ,A.RSLT ,A.DIS_RSN FROM TBDN_SELT_IDENT_INQ A, TBDN_SELT_REPT B WHERE B.RACER_PERIO_NO = A.RACER_PERIO_NO(+) AND NVL(B.DEL_YN,'N') = 'N' AND B.REPT_NO = A.REPT_NO(+) AND B.RACER_PERIO_NO = NVL(?, B.RACER_PERIO_NO) AND B.REPT_NO = NVL(?, B.REPT_NO) ORDER BY B.REPT_NO

SELECT B.RACER_PERIO_NO ,B.REPT_NO ,B.NM_KOR ,A.DT ,NVL(A.SCR,0) SCR ,DECODE(NVL(A.SCR,0),0,999,RANK() OVER (ORDER BY NVL(A.SCR,0) DESC)) RANK --,DECODE(NVL(A.SCR,0),0,999,DENSE_RANK() OVER (ORDER BY NVL(A.SCR,0) DESC)) RANK FROM TBDN_SELT_WRTN A, TBDN_SELT_REPT B WHERE B.RACER_PERIO_NO = A.RACER_PERIO_NO(+) AND NVL(B.DEL_YN,'N') = 'N' AND B.REPT_NO = A.REPT_NO(+) AND B.RACER_PERIO_NO = NVL(?, B.RACER_PERIO_NO) AND B.REPT_NO = NVL(?, B.REPT_NO) ORDER BY B.REPT_NO

SELECT B.RACER_PERIO_NO ,B.REPT_NO ,B.NM_KOR ,A.DT ,A.SCR --,A.RSLT ,DECODE(NVL(A.SCR,0),0,999,RANK() OVER (ORDER BY NVL(A.SCR,0) DESC))RANK FROM TBDN_SELT_HMNTR_INSP A, TBDN_SELT_REPT B WHERE B.RACER_PERIO_NO = A.RACER_PERIO_NO(+) AND NVL(B.DEL_YN,'N') = 'N' AND B.REPT_NO = A.REPT_NO(+) AND B.RACER_PERIO_NO = NVL(?, B.RACER_PERIO_NO) AND B.REPT_NO = NVL(?, B.REPT_NO) ORDER BY B.REPT_NO

SELECT B.RACER_PERIO_NO ,B.REPT_NO ,B.NM_KOR ,A.DT ,NVL(A.SCR,0) AS SCR ,DECODE(NVL(A.SCR,0),0,999,RANK() OVER (ORDER BY NVL(A.SCR,0) DESC)) RANK --,DECODE(NVL(A.SCR,0),0,999,DENSE_RANK() OVER (ORDER BY NVL(A.SCR,0) DESC)) RANK FROM TBDN_SELT_INVW A, TBDN_SELT_REPT B WHERE B.RACER_PERIO_NO = A.RACER_PERIO_NO(+) AND NVL(B.DEL_YN,'N') = 'N' AND B.REPT_NO = A.REPT_NO(+) AND B.RACER_PERIO_NO = NVL(?, B.RACER_PERIO_NO) AND B.REPT_NO = NVL(?, B.REPT_NO) ORDER BY B.REPT_NO

SELECT A2.* ,ROUND((A2.STRT_MESUR_AVG * (STRT_MESUR_RATE / 100)), 1) AS STRT_MESUR_CHNG_SCR ,ROUND((A2.WRTN_SCR * (WRTN_RATE / 100)), 1) AS WRTN_CHNG_SCR ,ROUND((A2.INVW_SCR * (INVW_RATE / 100)), 1) AS INVW_CHNG_SCR ,ROUND((A2.HMNTR_INSP * (HMNTR_INSP_RATE / 100)), 1) AS HMNTR_INSP_CHNG_SCR --,TO_NUMBER(DECODE(A2.WRTN_SCR + A2.INVW_SCR + A2.STRT_MESUR_AVG,0,'999', RANK() OVER(ORDER BY A2.WRTN_SCR + A2.INVW_SCR + A2.STRT_MESUR_AVG DESC ) )) AS RANK --,TO_NUMBER(DECODE(A2.TOT_ALL_SCR,0,'999', DENSE_RANK() OVER(ORDER BY A2.TOT_ALL_SCR DESC ) )) AS RANK ,TO_NUMBER(DECODE(STRT_MESUR_AVG*STRT_MESUR_RATE+WRTN_SCR*WRTN_RATE+INVW_SCR*INVW_RATE,0,'999', RANK() OVER(ORDER BY STRT_MESUR_AVG*STRT_MESUR_RATE+WRTN_SCR*WRTN_RATE+INVW_SCR*INVW_RATE DESC))) AS RANK FROM ( SELECT A1.RACER_PERIO_NO ,A1.REPT_NO ,A1.NM_KOR ,A1.WRTN_SCR ,A1.INVW_SCR ,A1.HMNTR_INSP ,A1.HMNTR_RSLT ,A1.PASS_YN ,A1.RSLT ,A1.STRT_MESUR_RATE ,A1.WRTN_RATE ,A1.INVW_RATE ,A1.HMNTR_INSP_RATE ,NVL(SUM( A1.SCR_01+A1.SCR_02+A1.SCR_03+A1.SCR_04+A1.SCR_05+A1.SCR_06+A1.SCR_07+A1.SCR_08), 0) STRT_MESUR_SCR ,ROUND(NVL(AVG((A1.SCR_01+A1.SCR_02+A1.SCR_03+A1.SCR_04+A1.SCR_05+A1.SCR_06+A1.SCR_07+A1.SCR_08)/8), 0),1) STRT_MESUR_AVG ,ROUND(NVL(SUM( A1.SCR_01+A1.SCR_02+A1.SCR_03+A1.SCR_04+A1.SCR_05+A1.SCR_06+A1.SCR_07+A1.SCR_08+A1.WRTN_SCR+A1.INVW_SCR),0),1) TOT_ALL_SCR FROM ( SELECT A.RACER_PERIO_NO ,A.REPT_NO ,A.NM_KOR ,DECODE(C.SCR_01,'' ,0, C.SCR_01 ) SCR_01 ,DECODE(C.SCR_02,'' ,0, C.SCR_02 ) SCR_02 ,DECODE(C.SCR_03,'' ,0, C.SCR_03 ) SCR_03 ,DECODE(C.SCR_04,'' ,0, C.SCR_04 ) SCR_04 ,DECODE(C.SCR_05,'' ,0, C.SCR_05 ) SCR_05 ,DECODE(C.SCR_06,'' ,0, C.SCR_06 ) SCR_06 ,DECODE(C.SCR_07,'' ,0, C.SCR_07 ) SCR_07 ,DECODE(C.SCR_08,'' ,0, C.SCR_08 ) SCR_08 --,DECODE(C.SCR_09,'' ,0, C.SCR_09 ) SCR_09 --,DECODE(C.SCR_10,'' ,0, C.SCR_10 ) SCR_10 --,DECODE(C.SCR_11,'' ,0, C.SCR_11 ) SCR_11 ,DECODE(E.SCR, '', 0, E.SCR) WRTN_SCR ,DECODE(G.SCR, '', 0, G.SCR) INVW_SCR ,D.RSLT RSLT ,F.SCR HMNTR_INSP ,F.RSLT HMNTR_RSLT ,H.PASS_YN PASS_YN ,( SELECT ASSGN_SCR_RATE FROM TBDN_SELT_BAS_ITEM WHERE RACER_PERIO_NO = ? AND ITEM = '001' ) STRT_MESUR_RATE ,( SELECT ASSGN_SCR_RATE FROM TBDN_SELT_BAS_ITEM WHERE RACER_PERIO_NO = ? AND ITEM = '002' ) WRTN_RATE ,( SELECT ASSGN_SCR_RATE FROM TBDN_SELT_BAS_ITEM WHERE RACER_PERIO_NO = ? AND ITEM = '003' ) INVW_RATE ,( SELECT ASSGN_SCR_RATE FROM TBDN_SELT_BAS_ITEM WHERE RACER_PERIO_NO = '14' /**P*/ AND ITEM = '004' ) HMNTR_INSP_RATE FROM TBDN_SELT_REPT A, TBDN_SELT_BODY_INSP B, TBDN_SELT_STRT_MESUR C, TBDN_SELT_IDENT_INQ D, TBDN_SELT_WRTN E, TBDN_SELT_HMNTR_INSP F, TBDN_SELT_INVW G, TBDN_SELT_END_RSLT H WHERE A.RACER_PERIO_NO = B.RACER_PERIO_NO(+) AND A.RACER_PERIO_NO = C.RACER_PERIO_NO(+) AND A.RACER_PERIO_NO = D.RACER_PERIO_NO(+) AND A.RACER_PERIO_NO = E.RACER_PERIO_NO(+) AND A.RACER_PERIO_NO = F.RACER_PERIO_NO(+) AND A.RACER_PERIO_NO = G.RACER_PERIO_NO(+) AND A.RACER_PERIO_NO = H.RACER_PERIO_NO(+) AND A.REPT_NO = B.REPT_NO(+) AND A.REPT_NO = C.REPT_NO(+) AND A.REPT_NO = D.REPT_NO(+) AND A.REPT_NO = E.REPT_NO(+) AND A.REPT_NO = F.REPT_NO(+) AND A.REPT_NO = G.REPT_NO(+) AND A.REPT_NO = H.REPT_NO(+) AND A.RACER_PERIO_NO = ? AND A.REPT_NO = NVL(?, B.REPT_NO) AND NVL(A.DEL_YN,'N')= 'N' )A1 GROUP BY A1.RACER_PERIO_NO, A1.REPT_NO, A1.NM_KOR, A1.SCR_01, A1.SCR_02, A1.SCR_03, A1.SCR_04, A1.SCR_05, A1.SCR_06, A1.SCR_07, A1.SCR_08, A1.WRTN_SCR, A1.INVW_SCR, A1.HMNTR_INSP, A1.HMNTR_RSLT, A1.PASS_YN, A1.RSLT, A1.STRT_MESUR_RATE,A1.WRTN_RATE, A1.INVW_RATE, A1.HMNTR_INSP_RATE )A2 ORDER BY A2.REPT_NO
INSERT INTO TBDN_SELT_BAS_ITEM ( RACER_PERIO_NO ,ITEM ,ASSGN_SCR_RATE ,RMK ,INST_ID ,INST_DTM )VALUES ( ? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,SYSDATE )
UPDATE TBDN_SELT_BAS_ITEM SET ASSGN_SCR_RATE = ? ,RMK = ? ,UPDT_ID = ? ,UPDT_DTM = SYSDATE WHERE RACER_PERIO_NO = ? AND ITEM = ?
DELETE FROM TBDN_SELT_BAS_ITEM WHERE RACER_PERIO_NO = ? AND ITEM = ?

INSERT INTO TBDN_SELT_BODY_INSP ( RACER_PERIO_NO ,REPT_NO ,DT ,NM_KOR ,HGHT ,WGHT ,SIGHT_LEFT ,SIGHT_RIGHT ,BLOD_PRES ,HEAR_LEFT ,HEAR_RIGHT ,COLOR_WEAK ,ECG ,CARDIAC_TEST ,RSLT ,IRREG_RSN ,INST_ID ,INST_DTM )VALUES ( ? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,SYSDATE )

UPDATE TBDN_SELT_BODY_INSP SET DT = ? ,HGHT = ? ,WGHT = ? ,SIGHT_LEFT = ? ,SIGHT_RIGHT = ? ,BLOD_PRES = ? ,HEAR_LEFT = ? ,HEAR_RIGHT = ? ,COLOR_WEAK = ? ,ECG = ? ,CARDIAC_TEST = ? ,RSLT = ? ,IRREG_RSN = ? ,UPDT_ID = ? ,UPDT_DTM = SYSDATE WHERE RACER_PERIO_NO = ? AND REPT_NO = ?
DELETE FROM TBDN_SELT_BODY_INSP WHERE RACER_PERIO_NO = ? AND REPT_NO = ?

INSERT INTO TBDN_SELT_STRT_MESUR ( RACER_PERIO_NO ,REPT_NO ,DT ,NM_KOR ,REC_01 ,SCR_01 ,REC_02 ,SCR_02 ,REC_03 ,SCR_03 ,REC_04 ,SCR_04 ,REC_05 ,SCR_05 ,REC_06 ,SCR_06 ,REC_07 ,SCR_07 ,REC_08 ,SCR_08 ,INST_ID ,INST_DTM )VALUES ( ? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,SYSDATE )

UPDATE TBDN_SELT_STRT_MESUR SET DT = ? ,REC_01 = ? ,SCR_01 = ? ,REC_02 = ? ,SCR_02 = ? ,REC_03 = ? ,SCR_03 = ? ,REC_04 = ? ,SCR_04 = ? ,REC_05 = ? ,SCR_05 = ? ,REC_06 = ? ,SCR_06 = ? ,REC_07 = ? ,SCR_07 = ? ,REC_08 = ? ,SCR_08 = ? ,UPDT_ID = ? ,UPDT_DTM = SYSDATE WHERE RACER_PERIO_NO = ? AND REPT_NO = ?
DELETE FROM TBDN_SELT_STRT_MESUR WHERE RACER_PERIO_NO = ? AND REPT_NO = ?
INSERT INTO TBDN_SELT_IDENT_INQ ( RACER_PERIO_NO ,REPT_NO ,DT ,NM_KOR ,RSLT ,DIS_RSN ,INST_ID ,INST_DTM )VALUES ( ? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,SYSDATE )
UPDATE TBDN_SELT_IDENT_INQ SET DT = ? ,RSLT = ? ,DIS_RSN = ? ,UPDT_ID = ? ,UPDT_DTM = SYSDATE WHERE RACER_PERIO_NO = ? AND REPT_NO = ?
DELETE FROM TBDN_SELT_IDENT_INQ WHERE RACER_PERIO_NO = ? AND REPT_NO = ?
INSERT INTO TBDN_SELT_WRTN ( RACER_PERIO_NO ,REPT_NO ,DT ,NM_KOR ,SCR ,INST_ID ,INST_DTM )VALUES ( ? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,SYSDATE )
UPDATE TBDN_SELT_WRTN SET DT = ? ,SCR = ? ,UPDT_ID = ? ,UPDT_DTM = SYSDATE WHERE RACER_PERIO_NO = ? AND REPT_NO = ?
DELETE FROM TBDN_SELT_WRTN WHERE RACER_PERIO_NO = ? AND REPT_NO = ?
INSERT INTO TBDN_SELT_HMNTR_INSP ( RACER_PERIO_NO ,REPT_NO ,DT ,NM_KOR ,SCR ,INST_ID ,INST_DTM )VALUES ( ? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,SYSDATE )
UPDATE TBDN_SELT_HMNTR_INSP SET DT = ? ,SCR = ? ,UPDT_ID = ? ,UPDT_DTM = SYSDATE WHERE RACER_PERIO_NO = ? AND REPT_NO = ?
DELETE FROM TBDN_SELT_HMNTR_INSP WHERE RACER_PERIO_NO = ? AND REPT_NO = ?
INSERT INTO TBDN_SELT_INVW ( RACER_PERIO_NO ,REPT_NO ,DT ,NM_KOR ,SCR ,INST_ID ,INST_DTM )VALUES ( ? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,SYSDATE )
UPDATE TBDN_SELT_INVW SET DT = ? ,SCR = ? ,UPDT_ID = ? ,UPDT_DTM = SYSDATE WHERE RACER_PERIO_NO = ? AND REPT_NO = ?
DELETE FROM TBDN_SELT_INVW WHERE RACER_PERIO_NO = ? AND REPT_NO = ?

INSERT INTO TBDN_SELT_END_RSLT ( RACER_PERIO_NO ,REPT_NO ,NM_KOR ,STRT_MESUR_SCR ,STRT_MESUR_CHNG_SCR ,WRTN_SCR ,WRTN_CHNG_SCR ,INVW_SCR ,INVW_CHNG_SCR ,RSLT ,HMNTR_INSP ,HMNTR_INSP_CHNG_SCR ,PASS_YN ,INST_ID ,INST_DTM )VALUES ( ? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,SYSDATE )

UPDATE TBDN_SELT_END_RSLT SET STRT_MESUR_SCR = ? ,STRT_MESUR_CHNG_SCR= ? ,WRTN_SCR = ? ,WRTN_CHNG_SCR = ? ,INVW_SCR = ? ,INVW_CHNG_SCR = ? ,RSLT = ? ,HMNTR_INSP = ? ,HMNTR_INSP_CHNG_SCR= ? ,PASS_YN = ? ,UPDT_ID = ? ,UPDT_DTM = SYSDATE WHERE RACER_PERIO_NO = ? AND REPT_NO = ?
DELETE FROM TBDN_SELT_END_RSLT WHERE RACER_PERIO_NO = ? AND REPT_NO = ?
